scripts.rebuild:electron: electron-rebuild -f -m src/app -v 1.7.7 -t prod,optional && electron-rebuild -f -m src/guest -v 1.7.7 -t prod,optional
scripts.install:all: echo ':wavebox' && npm install && cd src/app && echo ':wavebox-app' && npm install && cd ../../src/guest && echo ':wavebox-guest' && npm install && cd ../../src/scenes/mailboxes && echo ':wavebox-scenes-mailboxes' && npm install && cd ../content && echo ':wavebox-scenes-content' && npm install && cd ../monitor && echo ':wavebox-scenes-monitor' && npm install
scripts.outdated:all: echo ':wavebox' && npm outdated || true && cd src/app && echo ':wavebox-app' && npm outdated || true && cd ../../src/guest && echo ':wavebox-guest' && npm outdated || true && cd ../../src/scenes/mailboxes && echo ':wavebox-scenes-mailboxes' && npm outdated || true && cd ../content && echo ':wavebox-scenes-content' && npm outdated || true && cd ../monitor && echo ':wavebox-scenes-monitor' && npm outdated || true
scripts.prune:all: echo ':wavebox' && npm prune && cd src/app && echo ':wavebox-app' && npm prune && cd ../../src/guest && echo ':wavebox-guest' && npm prune && cd ../../src/scenes/mailboxes && echo ':wavebox-scenes-mailboxes' && npm prune && cd ../content && echo ':wavebox-scenes-content' && npm prune && cd ../monitor && echo ':wavebox-scenes-monitor' && npm prune
